Texts.Chs: 阿尤连是站点的武器制造商。他售卖武器蓝图，协助星际战士制造武器。
Texts.Eng: Ayurin is the local weaponsmith. He sells weapon blueprints and assists Starfarers in crafting weapons.

Texts.Chs: 阿周那
Texts.Eng: Azana

Texts.Chs: 在星辰旅馆的酒吧你可以买到饮料和食物。
Texts.Eng: Drinks and food can be purchased from the bar at the Starsight Inn.

Texts.Chs: 我是阿周那，安那可系统公司创建的虚拟向导。我为新手和老手提供有关远星的信息。
Texts.Eng: I am Azana, a Virtual Guide created by Anakhar Systems. I provide newcomers and veterans alike with information about the Starfarer's Refuge.

Texts.Chs: 用勋绩代币交换，战机军团终端允许你招募战机船员。
Texts.Eng: In exchange for Tokens of Merit, the Droden Legion Terminal allows you to recruit Droden crewmembers.

Texts.Chs: 看起来你已经采取了主动的姿态去探索远星避难所。
Texts.Eng: It appears that you have taken the initiative to explore the Starfarer's Refuge yourself.

Texts.Chs: 扎克尔销售阿威坎游牧民认可的座乘和座乘零部件。
Texts.Eng: Jahkar sells Nomada-certified vehicles and vehicle components.

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;阿周那^reset;处
Texts.Eng: Return to ^orange;Azana^reset; in the ^orange;Starfarer's Refuge^reset;

Texts.Chs: 扫描仪是个伟大的发现工具。
Texts.Eng: Scanning is a great tool for discovery.

Texts.Chs: 感谢您使用安那可系统虚拟向导。我希望我今天能向你提供有用的信息。仅此而已。
Texts.Eng: Thank you for using this Anakhar Systems Virtual Guide. I hope to have provided you with useful information today. Vas Vha'leih.

Texts.Chs: 远星庇护所的介绍到此结束。当你准备好接受小小的奖励时，请^green;回到我这里^white;。
Texts.Eng: That concludes the tour of the Starfarer's Refuge. Please, ^green;return to me^white; when you're ready for a small reward.

Texts.Chs: 游牧者商店提供个性化的传送装置。这里还有一个公共使用的传送器。
Texts.Eng: The Nomada Translocator Store offers personalized teleportation devices. It also features a teleporter for public use.

Texts.Chs: 远星庇护所
Texts.Eng: The Starfarer's Refuge

Texts.Chs: 远星庇护所提供许多服务。除了服务这里还有更多的事物等着被发现。
Texts.Eng: The Starfarer's Refuge offers many services. There is still more to be found.

Texts.Chs: 监理人的办公室就在这些安全控制台后面。这些办公室只对该组织的成员开放。
Texts.Eng: The offices of the Watchers are found behind these security consoles. The offices are only accessible to members of the organization.

Texts.Chs: 这位游牧民供应商允许您使用勋绩代币来购买各种材料。
Texts.Eng: This vendor of the Nomada Token Exchange allows you to purchase a variety of materials using Tokens of Merit.

Texts.Chs: 这位游牧民供应商允许您使用各种材料来换取勋绩代币。
Texts.Eng: This vendor of the Nomada Token Exchange allows you to trade leftover materials in exchange for Tokens of Merit.

Texts.Chs: 瓦利安提供座乘回收和修复服务。
Texts.Eng: Valyan offers vehicle reparation and restoration services.

Texts.Chs: 欢迎来到远星庇护所，新来者！我是^orange;阿周那^white;，你的虚拟向导。请花点时间熟悉一下在^orange;远星庇护所^white;提供的多种服务。^green;扫描感兴趣的区域，我会向你转达有关服务的信息。
Texts.Eng: Welcome to the Starfarer's Refuge, new arrival! I am ^orange;Azana^white;, your virtual guide. Please take the time to familiarize yourself with the many services offered in the ^orange;Starfarer's Refuge^white;. ^green;Scan areas of interest, and I will relay you information about the services provided there.

Texts.Chs: ^green;扫描物件^reset;以了解更多有关于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的信息
Texts.Eng: ^green;Scan objects^reset; to learn more about the ^orange;Starfarer's Refuge^reset;
